title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added release notes for GHES versions 3.14.14, 3.15.9, 3.16.5, and 3.17.2 with security fixes, bug fixes, and known issues.
Enabled automatic dependency submission for .NET (NuGet) ecosystems.
Updated dependency submission docs to clarify private Maven registry access with self-hosted runners.
Silenced additional Sass deprecation warnings in build configuration.
Truncated lint output to avoid GitHub issue body size limits.
summary:
- Added release notes for GHES versions 3.14.14, 3.15.9, 3.16.5, and 3.17.2 with security fixes, bug fixes, and known issues.
- Enabled automatic dependency submission for .NET (NuGet) ecosystems.
- Updated dependency submission docs to clarify private Maven registry access with self-hosted runners.
- Silenced additional Sass deprecation warnings in build configuration.
- Truncated lint output to avoid GitHub issue body size limits.
- Adjusted GHES 3.13 deprecation date.
generated_title: GHES release notes, .NET dependency submission support, and tooling improvements
commits: **24d409a**: Silence Sass deprecation warnings in build output (#56422) (by Kevin Heis)
**b9a09f2**: Truncate lint output to prevent GitHub issue body size limit errors (#56409) (by Kevin Heis)
**119216d**: Minor tweaks for .net autosubmission support (#56370) (by Eric Sorenson)
**9e4144c**: Patch release notes for GitHub Enterprise Server (#56340) (by release-controller[bot])
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added release notes for GHES versions 3.14.14, 3.15.9, 3.16.5, and 3.17.2 with security fixes, bug fixes, and known issues.
- Enabled automatic dependency submission for .NET (NuGet) ecosystems.
- Updated dependency submission docs to clarify private Maven registry access with self-hosted runners.
- Silenced additional Sass deprecation warnings in build configuration.
- Truncated lint output to avoid GitHub issue body size limits.
- Adjusted GHES 3.13 deprecation date.

### Title  
GHES release notes, .NET dependency submission support, and tooling improvements
